revisions.rev:
{{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} '''William of Nassau''' ({{Lang-nl|Willem de Rijke}}) (10 April 1487 â 6 October 1559) was a count of [[Nassau-Dillenburg]] from the [[House of Nassau]]. He was called '''William the Rich'''.
William was born in [[Dillenburg]] as the younger son of Count [[John V of Nassau-Dillenburg]] and landgravine [[Elisabeth of Hesse (d. 1523)|Elisabeth of Hesse]], daughter of Landgrave [[Henry III of Hesse-Marburg]] and [[Anna of Katzenelnbogen]] He was the brother of count [[Henry III of Nassau-Breda]] and the father of [[William I of Orange]].
His eldest son [[William the Silent|William]] inherited the principality of [[House of Orange-Nassau|Orange]]. The early [[House of Orange-Nassau]] descends from him, while the later [[House of Orange-Nassau]] (and the Dutch royal family) descends from his second son [[John VI of Nassau-Dillenburg|John]].
==Family and children== William of Nassau was married twice. Firstly, he married on 29 October 1506 Countess Walburga van Egmont (29 October 1490 – March 1529), daughter of [[John III of Egmont]]. She gave him two daughters: # Elisabeth ( October 1515 â 31 January 1523) # Magdalene ( 6 October 1522 â 18 August 1567), married on 16 July 1538 to Count [[Hermann of Neuenahr and MÃ¶rs]]
After her death, he married on 20 September 1531 Countess [[Juliana of Stolberg|Juliane of Stolberg-Wernigerode]] (15 February 1506 – 18 June 1580). They had twelve children: # [[William the Silent|William I of Orange]] (24 April 1533 – 10 July 1584) # Hermanna (b. 9 August 1534), died young # [[John VI of Nassau-Dillenburg|John VI "The Elder"]] (22 November 1536 – 28 October 1606) # [[Louis of Nassau]] (10 January 1538 – 14 April 1574) # [[Maria of Nassau (1539-1599)|Maria]] (15 March 1539 – May 1599), married on 11 November 1556 to Count [[Wilhelm IV of Berg-s'Heerenberg]] # [[Adolf of Nassau (1540-1568)|Adolf]] (11 July 1540 – 23 May 1568) # Anna (21 September 1541 – 12 February 1616), married on 16 June 1559 to Count [[Albrecht of Nassau-Weilburg-Ottweiler]] # [[Elisabeth of Nassau-Dillenburg|Elisabeth]] (25 September 1542 – 18 November 1603), married 16 June 1559 to Count [[Conrad of Solms-Braunfels]] # Katharine (19 December 1542 – 25 December 1624), married on 17 November 1560 to Count [[GÃ¼nther XLI of Schwarzburg-Arnstadt]] # [[Juliana of Nassau-Dillenburg|Juliana]] (10 August 1546 – 31 August 1588), married 14 June 1575 to Count [[Albrecht VII of Schwarzburg-Rudolstadt]] # Magdalene (15 December 1547 – 16 May 1633), married on 27 January 1567 to Count [[Wolfgang of Hohenlohe-Weikersheim]] # [[Henry of Nassau-Dillenburg|Henry]] (15 October 1550 – 14 April 1574)
